pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ecological Inference Applying Entropy // Implements two estimations related to the foundations of info metrics applied to ecological inference. These methodologies assess the lack of disaggregated data and provide an approach to obtaining disaggregated territorial-level data. For more details, see the following references: Fernndez-Vzquez, E., Daz-Dapena, A., Rubiera-Morolln, F. et al. (2020) "Spatial Disaggregation of Social Indicators: An Info-Metrics Approach." doi:10.1007/s11205-020-02455-z. Daz-Dapena, A., Fernndez- Vzquez, E., Rubiera-Morolln, F., Vinuela, A. (2021) "Mapping poverty at the local level in Europe: A consistent spatial disaggregation of the AROPE indicator for France, Spain, Portugal and the United Kingdom." doi:10.1111/rsp3.12379.
